languages.text: "Не боишься глаголить открыто, м? Почитаешь себя благочестивее и умнее, чем прочие, те, чьи глаза и уши впитали больше мудрости и света?" {n}Глаза Иеронимуса вспыхивают нехорошим огнем.{/n}

"You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не боишься глаголить открыто, м? Почитаешь себя благочестивее и умнее, чем прочие, те, чьи глаза и уши впитали больше мудрости и света?" {n}Глаза Иеронимуса вспыхивают нехорошим огнем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and clever than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

"You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and clever than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

"You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

"You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

"You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

languages.text: “你并不惧怕畅所欲言，是吧？你自以为你自己比别人更有德行、更聪明吗？就连那些双眼和耳朵比你吸收了更多光芒与智慧的人，都无法与你相提并论吗？”{n}希罗尼穆斯的双眼中闪过了不祥的光芒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你并不惧怕畅所欲言，是吧？你自以为你自己比别人更有德行、更聪明吗？就连那些双眼和耳朵比你吸收了更多光芒与智慧的人，都无法与你相提并论吗？”{n}希罗尼穆斯的双眼中闪过了不祥的光芒。{/n}

languages.text: «No teme hablar con total libertad, ¿verdad? ¿Piensa que es más virtuos{mf|o|a} y astut{mf|o|a} que los demás, más aún que aquellos que han absorbido más luz y sabiduría que usted?». {n}Los ojos de Hieronymus adquieren un brillo siniestro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No teme hablar con total libertad, ¿verdad? ¿Piensa que es más virtuos{mf|o|a} y astut{mf|o|a} que los demás, más aún que aquellos que han absorbido más luz y sabiduría que usted?». {n}Los ojos de Hieronymus adquieren un brillo siniestro.{/n}

languages.text: 「これはまた大胆なことを。御身よりも遥かに多くの光や知恵を吸収してきた者より、ご自身のほうが遥かに高潔で賢いと思っているのでしょうか？」{n}ヒエロニムスの目が不気味に光った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これはまた大胆なことを。御身よりも遥かに多くの光や知恵を吸収してきた者より、ご自身のほうが遥かに高潔で賢いと思っているのでしょうか？」{n}ヒエロニムスの目が不気味に光った。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt keine Angst davor, frei zu sprechen, nicht wahr? Ihr haltet Euch für tugendhafter und klüger als andere, einschließlich jener, deren Augen und Ohren mehr Licht und Weisheit in sich aufgenommen haben als Ihr?" {n}Hieronymus' Augen funkeln bedrohlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt keine Angst davor, frei zu sprechen, nicht wahr? Ihr haltet Euch für tugendhafter und klüger als andere, einschließlich jener, deren Augen und Ohren mehr Licht und Weisheit in sich aufgenommen haben als Ihr?" {n}Hieronymus' Augen funkeln bedrohlich.{/n}

languages.text: « De toute évidence, la franchise ne vous fait pas peur. Vous vous pensez plus vertueuse et maligne que les autres, même ceux dont les yeux et les oreilles ont absorbé plus de lumière et de sagesse ? » {n}Le regard de Hiéronymus s'illumine de façon inquiétante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, la franchise ne vous fait pas peur. Vous vous pensez plus vertueuse et maligne que les autres, même ceux dont les yeux et les oreilles ont absorbé plus de lumière et de sagesse ? » {n}Le regard de Hiéronymus s'illumine de façon inquiétante.{/n}

languages.text: "Aklındakileri söylemekten çekinmiyorsun, değil mi? Diğerlerinden, gözleri ve kulakları seninkilerden çok daha fazla ışığa ve irfana nail olmuş olanlardan bile daha doğrucu ve daha zeki olduğunu mu düşünüyorsun?" {n}Hieronymus'un gözleri uğursuzca parlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You aren't afraid to speak freely, are you? You think yourself more virtuous and cleverer than others, even those whose eyes and ears have absorbed more light and wisdom than you?" {n}Hieronymus's eyes flash ominously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aklındakileri söylemekten çekinmiyorsun, değil mi? Kendinin diğerlerinden, gözleri ve kulakları seninkilerden çok daha fazla ışığa ve irfana nail olmuş olanlardan bile daha doğrucu ve daha zeki olduğunu mu düşünüyorsun?" {n}Hieronymus'un gözleri uğursuzca parlıyor.{/n}
